Package entities

Class Expense

java.lang.Object
entities.Transaction
entities.Expense
public class Expense extends Transaction
Clasa care reprezinta o cheltuiala, extinde clasa "Transaction" si are ca atribut specific "essential"

  • Constructor Details

    • Expense

      public Expense()
      Constructor implicit

    • Expense

      public Expense(int id, String n, double a, String c, String p, LocalDate d, boolean s, boolean e, String cr, boolean es)
      Constructor explicit
      Parameters:
      id - ID ul tranzactiei
      n - numele tranzactiei
      a - suma tranzactiei
      c - categoria tranzactiei
      p - modul de plata al tranzactiei
      d - data in care a fost efectuata tranzactia
      s - indica daca tranzactia e de tip abonament
      e - indica daca tranzactia e exclusa din raport
      es - indica daca tranzactia e esentiala

  • Method Details

    • isEssential

      public boolean isEssential()
      Returneaza daca cheltuiala e esentiala
      Returns:
      "true" daca este esentiala, "false" altfel

    • flipEssential

      public void flipEssential()
      Daca cheltuiala e esentiala devine neesentiala si invers

    • setEssential

      public void setEssential(boolean e)
      Seteaza daca cheluiala e esentiala sau nu
      Parameters:
      e - daca tranzactia e esentiala sau nu
